analysis.key_quote: Transforming policy-influencing career positions into at-will roles under the proposed “Schedule Policy/Career” designation would introduce significant risks to nonpartisan integrity, discourage career expertise, and create a chilling effect on legitimate dissent.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the implementation of Schedule F, emphasizing the importance of the merit-based civil service system and the risks of politicization. It highlights concerns about due process and the loss of institutional knowledge, which align with a strong opposition to the proposed rule.
